channel.title: How can i make it that admins and owners can do ::pickup commands?
channel.description: how??!!!?! i have added so much to my server and i just relaised i cant do ::pickup commands ...

item.title: How can i make it that admins and owners can do ::pickup commands?
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

well if you want so that only admins and up can do pickup… wll then

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2){ try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); } }

item.source: How can i make it that admins and owners can do ::pickup commands?
